document.docAuthor: Jerinić-Prodanović, Dušanka, Mihajlović, Ljubodrag & Stojanović, Aleksandar
document.masterDocTitle: Parasitoids of jumping plant-lice (Psylloidea, Hemiptera) from the family Encyrtidae (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea) in Serbia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Parasitoids of jumping plant-lice (Psylloidea, Hemiptera) from the family Encyrtidae (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea) in Serbia

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
Acizzia jamatonica (Kuwayama)
from
Albizia julibrissin Durazz., Zemun, Kej
, 04.viii.2015 , ex pupa 1♀ .
Baeopelma foersteri (Flor)
, from
Alnus glutinosa (Linnaeus)
, Bosiljkovac, 25.v.2007 . ex pupa 30.v.2007 . 1 ♂ . Kusić, 16.v.2007 . ex pupa 28.v.2007 . 1♀ 3♂♂ .
Cacopsylla bidens (Šulc)
, from
Pyrus communis Linnaeus, Begeč
, 09.vi.2008 . ex pupa 16.vi.2008 . 1♀ , Bogatić , 20.vi.2006 . ex pupa 30.vi.2006 . 1♀ . Fruška gora, Kurjakovac, 02.x.2008 . ex pupa 06.x.2008 . 4♀♀ 4 ♂♂ , Ilinci, 22.vi.2008 . ex pupa 26.vi.2008 . 6♀♀ 1♂ , 26.vi.2011 . ex pupa 4♀♀ , Voluja, 25.v.2007 . ex pupa 07.vi.2007 . 5♀♀ 1♂ , Zemun-fakultet, 19.vi.2006 . ex pupa 23.vii.2006 . 7♀♀ 3♂♂ , 21.vi.2006 . ex pupa 22.vi.2006 . 2♀♀ 6♂♂ ; 27.vi.2006 . ex pupa 30.vi.2006 . 12♀♀ 16♂♂ , 11.vii.2006 . ex pupa 13.vii.2006 . 7♀♀ , 13.vii.2006 . ex pupa 17.vii.2006 . 5♀♀ 7♂♂ , 24.vii.2006 . ex pupa 28.vii.2006 . 3♀♀ 4♂♂ ; 21.vii.2007 . ex pupa 22.vi.2007 . 4♂♂ and ex pupa 25.vi.2007 1♀ , 06.v.2009 . ex pupa 1♀ 3♂♂ , 02.vi.2009 . ex pupa 11.vi.2009 . 3♀♀ 4♂♂ , 15.vi. 2009 . ex pupa 1♂ , 25.v.2009 . ex pupa 3♀♀ 7♂♂ , 22.vii.2010 . ex pupa 26.vii.2009 . 16♀♀ 10♂♂ , 22.vi.2015 ex pupa 2♀♀ 11♂ .
Cacopsylla crataegi (Schrank)
from
Crataegus monogyna Jacq., Ilinci
, 24.v.2008 . ex pupa 30.v.2008 . 1♀ 1♂ .
Cacopsylla melanoneura (Foerster)
, from
Malus domestica Mill., Donja Omašnica
, 04.v.2008 ex pupa 1♀ 2♂♂ ; Ilinci, 03.v.2008 . ex pupa 10.v.2008 . 2♀♀ ; 02.v.2010 . ex pupa 21.v.2010 . 1♂ .
Cacopsylla melanoneura
from
Crataegus monogyna, Drenovac
, 20.iv.2008 . ex pupa 1♀ 1♂ , Laćarak, 01.v.2009 . ex pupa 1♀ 1♂ , Rataje, 04.v.2008 . ex pupa 1♀ , Velika Drenova, 04.v.2008 . ex pupa 1♀ 1♂ , Ilinci, 04.v.2015 . ex pupa 15.v.2015 2♀ 1♂ ;
Cacopsylla melanoneura
,
from
Crataegus oxyacantha
cv. rubra plena Linnaeus Zemun-Nova Galenika, 10.v.2005 . ex pupa 2♀♀ 30.v.2005 ., 22.iv.2008 . ex pupa 1♂ , 18.v.2008 . ex pupa 23.v.2008 . 2♂♂ .
Cacopsylla peregrina (Foerster)
, from
Crataegus monogyna , Ilinci
, 15.v.2005 . ex pupa 30.v.2005 . 1♂ ; 21.v.2005 . ex pupa 1♀ 1 ♂ ; 08.v.2005 . ex pupa 21.v.2005 . 2♀♀ ; 27.iv. 2008 . ex pupa 14.v.2008 . 2 ♀♀ , Uzovnica, 29.iv.2007 . ex pupa 16.v.2007 . 1♂ 1♀ , Vatin, 15.v.2006 . ex pupa 1♂ .
Cacopsylla picta (Foerster)
from
Malus domestica , Ilinci
, 24.v.2008 . ex pupa 2♀♀ , 08.vi.2008 . ex pupa 1♀ .
Cacopsylla pruni (Scopoli)
, from
Prunus domestica Linnaeus, Obedska
bara, 04.vi.2005 . ex pupa 19.vi.2005 . 3♀♀ 1♂ , Ilinci, 28.v.2005 . ex pupa 1♀ 1♂ .
Cacopsylla pruni
,
from
Prunus spinosa , Ilinci
, 19.vi.2005 . ex pupa 2♀♀ 2♂♂ .
Cacopsylla pyri
(L.), from
Pyrus communis , Ilinci
, 24.vi.2007 . ex pupa 02.vii.2007 . 4♀♀ 3♂♂ , Izvor, 14.iv.2009 . ex pupa 3♀♀ 5♂♂ , Radmilovac, 27.vi.2005 ., ex pupa 2♀♀ , 12.vi.2006 ., ex pupa 2♀♀ , 26.vi.2006 ., ex pupa 30.vi.2006 . 7♀♀ 4♂♂ , 22.vii.2006 ., ex pupa 30.vii.2006 . 1♂ , 18.xi.2006 ., ex pupa 30.xi.2006 . 3♀ , 07.v.2007 . ex pupa 16.v.2007 . 3♀♀ 2♂♂ . 07.ix.2008 . ex pupa 1♂ , 30.v.2012 . ex pupa 15.vi.2012 . 1♀ .
Cacopsylla pyricola (Foerster)
, from
Pyrus communis, Cerovac
, 30.iv.2007 . ex pupa 07.v.2007 . 2♀♀ ; Gusta Jela, 12.viii.2006 . ex pupa 1♂ ; Ilinci, 08.vi.2008 . ex pupa 1♂ . Rudna Glava, 25.v.2007 ., ex pupa 30.v.2007 . 2♀♀ 3♂♂ ,
Cacopsylla pyricola
,
from
Pyrus
sp. Predov krst (livada), 13.vii.2007 . ex pupa 19.vii.2007 . 3♀♀ 6♂♂ .
Cacopsylla pyrisuga (Foerster)
, from
Pyrus communis , Divčibare, Česma
, 03.vii.2009 . ex pupa 14.vii.2009 . 4♀♀ 5♂♂ ; Ilinci, 24.vi.2007 . ex pupa 25.vi.2007 . 1♀ ; 01.v.2008 . ex pupa 15.v.2008 . 1♂ . 08.vi.2008 . ex pupa 17.vi.2008 . 5♀♀ 4♂♂ , 17.v.2009 . ex pupa 25.v.2009 . 3♀♀ 1♂ , 30.v.2010 . ex pupa 3♀♀ , 19.vi.2010 . ex pupa 7♀♀ 8♂♂ , Knjaževac , 27.v.2008 . ex pupa 1♂ , Nemenikuće, 15.vi.2006 . ex pupa 19.vi.2006 . 14♀♀ 8♂♂ , ex pupa 23.vi.2006 . 2♀♀ 1♂ ; Rudna Glava, 25.v.2007 . ex pupa 03.vi.2007 4♀♀ ; Sokobanja , 27.v.2008 . ex pupa 1♂ .
Cacopsylla pyrisuga
,
from
Pyrus
sp. Predov krst (livada), 13.vii.2007 . ex pupa 21.vii.2007 . 15♀♀ 4♂♂ .
Cacopsylla
spp.
(
C. pyrisuga
,
C. pyricola
,
C. bidens
) sa
Pyrus communis, Ilinci
, 22.vi.2006 . ex pupa 12♀♀ 1♂ .
Cacopsylla
spp.
(
C. pyrisuga
and
C. bidens
) Voluja, 25.v.2007 . ex pupa 04.vi.2007 . 4♀♀ 1♂ , ex pupa 07.vi.2007 5♀♀ 1♂ .
Cacopsylla rhamnicola (Scott)
, from
Rhamnus cathartica Linnaeus, Belgrade—Hotel Jugoslavija
, 26.v.2005 . ex pupa 03.vi.2005 . 2♂♂ , Ilinci, 17.v.2009 . ex pupa 29.v.2009 . 1♀ .
Cacopsylla rhamnicola
from
Rhamnus fallax Boiss., Tara, Bilješke
stene 18.vi.2016 . ex pupa 1♂ .
Trophic status. Parasitoid of jumping plant-lice.

Hosts .
Agonoscena pistaciae Burckhardt and Lauterer
,
Arytaina
sp.,
Cacopsylla americana (Crawford)
,
C. bidens
,
C. crataegi
,
C. mali (Schmidberger)
,
C. melanoneura
,
C. peregrina
,
C. pyri
,
C. pyricola
,
C. pyrisuga
,
C. ribesiae (Crawford)
,
Ceanothia essigi (Jensen)
,
C. insolita (Tuthill)
,
Euglyptoneura fuscipennis (Crawford)
,
E. minuta (Crawford)
,
E. robusta (Crawford)
,
Livilla retamae (Puton)
,
Pexopsylla cercocarpi Jensen
,
Psylla alni (Flor)
,
P. floccosa Patch
,
Trioza beameri Tuthill
(
Grbić et al. 1989
; Zuparko 2015 ;
Zendedel et al. 2016
; Noyes 2017).

Diagnosis. Scape dark with metallic reflection. Male scape and pedicel dark with metallic reflections, remainder parts of antenna yellow. Scutellum purple, with reflections. Procoxa yellow, profemur weakly darkened. Ovipositor sheath clearly noticeable. The specimens match the description by Nikolskaya (1952) , Erdös (1964) , Trjapitzin (1989) , Noyes & Hanson (1996) .

Comments.
Prionomitus mitratus
was reared from 12 species of jumping plant-lice, ten from the genus
Cacopsylla
(
C. bidens
,
C. crataegi
,
C. melanoneura
,
C. picta
,
C . peregrina
,
C . pruni
,
C . pyri
,
C . pyricola
,
C . pyrisuga
, C. rhamnicola
) and one each from the genera
Acizzia
(
A . jamatonica
) and
Baeopelma
(
B. foersteri
).
P. mitratus
was recorded in the largest number of localities.
P. mitratus
has so far been recorded as a parasitoid of jumping plant-lice from the genera
Arytaina , Cacopsylla , Ceanothia , Euglyptoneura , Livilla, Pachypsylla , Pexopsylla
and
Trioza
( Jensen 1957 ;
Conci et al. 1995
;
Percy et al. 2012
; Zuparko 2015 ; Noyes 2017). In Europe,
P. mitratus
was confirmed as a highly efficient natural enemy of a number of jumping plant-lice species, mainly
C. pyri
( Ferriere 1961 ; Herard 1986 ). Herard (1986) reported that
P. mitratus
parasitizes
C. pyri
,
C. melanoneura
and
C. pyrisuga .
Researching the parasitoid complex of
C. pyri
in France ,
Armand et al . (1991)
stated that
P. mitratus
mainly parasitizes the first generation of
C. pyri
, while in the following generations, it emerges in a somewhat lower number compared to other parasitoids.
Grbić et al. (1989)
recorded it from
C. pyrisuga
in Serbia .

From Europe,
P. mitratus
was introduced into Canada and the USA for biological control of
Cacopsylla pyricola
, where it has shown partial efficiency ( Noyes & Hanson 1996 ).

Here,
P. mitratus
is recorded in association with
Acizzia jamatonica , Baeopelma foersteri , C. picta
and
C. rhamnicola
for the first time ( Table 2 ).
